pageTitle: WHY REGISTER WITH MOSAIC WEIGHTED BLANKETS REGISTRY
header: Experience an easy & complete gift registry!

contentParagraph.content: It is our pleasure to help you set up your registry!
Mosaic Weighted Blankets Registry is the perfect destination for your gift registry. With a complete and comprehensive selection of weighted blankets, you can get the gifts you want all in one place.
No more duplicate gifts and all gifts are shipped right to your door!
We work to create an experience that is fun and simple. Our registry specialists will work with you to assemble a registry that fulfills all the needs for better rest, comfort and sleep.
Our Mosaic Weighted Blankets Registry team will work hand in hand with your guests to ensure items are purchased, wrapped and shipped in a quick, accurate and beautiful manner.
